harmonizR 2.0.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Main usage of harmonizR

Reference

All functions

create_data_dict()

Create a data dictionary in Maelstrom basic format from a dataset

create_markdown_template()

Create a template for the visual report bookdown.

create_project_in_opal()

Create an Opal project

download_files_from_opal()

Download files from Opal in R environment

download_tables_from_opal()

Download tables and data dictionary from Opal in R environment

generate_harmonized_study_bookdown_report()

Generate a summary report for a harmonized dataset

generate_individual_study_bookdown_report()

Generate a summary report bookdown for a study dataset

harmonizR_help()

Call the help center for full documentation.

mlstr_all_na_column()

Extract 'all NA' columns in a dataset.

mlstr_count_tag()

Count tags in a data dictionary.

mlstr_file_index_create()

Create an index of files in a folder

mlstr_file_index_read()

Read, source and open objects listed in an index of files in a folder

mlstr_file_index_search()

Search in an index of files in a folder

mlstr_identify_plot_type()

Generate R script of plots based on viz type of the variable.

mlstr_identify_viz_type()

Automatize identification of visual type based on value type of the variable.

mlstr_plot_bar()

Draw bar plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_box()

Draw box plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_date()

Draw lollipop plot of one (possibly grouped) time related column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_density()

Draw density line plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_histogram()

Draw histogram plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_main_word()

Draw bar plot of one (possibly grouped) open text column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_pie()

Draw pie plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset

mlstr_plot_pie_valid_value()

Draw pie plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset (valid, non-valid and missing values)

mlstr_process_harmonization()

Generate harmonized dataset(s) and annotated data processing elements file

mlstr_summary_category()

Create datatable of one (possibly grouped) category-type variable of a dataset

mlstr_summary_numerical()

Create datatable of one (possibly grouped) numerical-type variable of a dataset

mlstr_summary_text()

Create datatable of one (possibly grouped) text-type variable of a dataset

project_envir_create()

Create folders for a harmonization project

read_csv_sans_echec()

Read all csv file using readr::read_csv and avoid errors

read_excel_allsheets()

Read all excel sheets using readxl::read_excel recursively.

summarize_harmonization()

Generate data processing elements summary using annotated data processing elements R object

upload_files_to_opal()

Upload files to an Opal environment.

upload_tables_to_opal()

Upload one tibble from R environment in Opal environment as tables in project.
